ocean.gui.animatedobjects
Class AnimationObject

java.lang.Object
  ocean.gui.animatedobjects.AnimationObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bubble, Ship, Submarine, Surface, Weed, Whale
public abstract class AnimationObject
extends java.lang.Object

A class representing objects that are to be animated and moved around.
